DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness combine dermatological treatment child 5 year old mild moderate atopic dermatitis .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Combined Dermatological Treatment Children With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Children 1 month 5 year old Patients atopic dermatitis mildmoderate SCORAD=1640 Other dermatological disease could interfere study result Corticoids use 3 week prior study Antibiotics use treat atopic dermatitis 3 week prior study Use topical immunomodulators Concurrent use emollient
